title: 有些少錢想開公司做renewable energy（會涉及產品研發），應該邊度開同搵人？

replies.msg:
我搵到個好niche既market，business mode 會係business to governments /organisations，全世界都未有人做，想搵人一齊做產品研發，Seed fund 只有大約2M (唔係萬)CAD，最理想係美國（人叻但人工好貴），驚頂唔到好耐，所以想問下仲有冇邊度可以考慮，同埋如果想搵兩個partner（一個主導technical，另一個去r funding，冇佢地冇angel funds 會投資），我邊俾錢邊學，邊度搵人好？

謝
搵到兩個partner返黎就比人飛起你啦 你價值係咩

支那種知識產權保護

replies.msg: 所以唔會搵中國人

I am on the funding side of the energy biz, you can typically look to OPIC or IFC for funding but you need to prepare a good funding story (rather just a tagline of non-renewable), such as emission reduction, GDP contribution, employment, country development if it is a developing country.

What kind of products are you launching? Very few financiers will fund a product development, most of the cases but its high risk, you probably need shareholder + balance sheet guarantee. Other than OPIC/ IFC / EPC+F financing, you can consider taking a corporate loan from bank, and look for refinancing after product launch.

Typical loan grace period is around 2 years + 3-5 years of repayment depending on the country and your firm's. Looks like you are in Canada, so fortunately the funding market is pretty decent and attractive. You need to have a good proposal, and a feasible product with 3rd party consultant assessment on both the engineering aspect and the CAPEX.

兩百萬想搞能源？

美金都未必得喎

quote.msg:
兩百萬想搞能源？

美金都未必得喎

replies.msg: 自膠 原來係CAD

I am on the funding side of the energy biz, you can typically look to OPIC or IFC for funding but you need to prepare a good funding story (rather just a tagline of non-renewable), such as emission reduction, GDP contribution, employment, country development if it is a developing country.

What kind of products are you launching? Very few financiers will fund a product development, most of the cases (if it's a high risk project), you will probably need shareholder + balance sheet guarantee. Other than OPIC/ IFC / EPC+F financing, you can consider taking a corporate loan from bank, and look for refinancing after product launch.

Typical loan grace period is around 2 years + 3-5 years of repayment depending on the country and your firm's. Looks like you are in Canada, so fortunately the funding market is pretty decent and attractive. You need to have a good proposal, and a feasible product with 3rd party consultant assessment on both the engineering aspect and the CAPEX.

Very few financiers will fund a product development, most of the cases (if it's a high risk project), you will probably need shareholder + balance sheet guarantee. Other than OPIC/ IFC / EPC+F financing, you can consider taking a corporate loan from bank, and look for refinancing after product launch.

Looks like you are in Canada, so fortunately the funding market is pretty decent and attractive. replies.msg:
Funding 好難請人, 請到都會好貴(10幾萬HKD net salary一個月 + 30-70% annual bonus), 你肯比錢個人都未必留得耐。 因為佢地係corporate / investment banker/ Private equity, 一年做好多個project, 你得一個project 佢會好悶。

你得2m CAD, 出佢份糧都無左一大部分。你請個 similar background 既 finance associate 會可行D，但要有energy / infrastructure / PE既background，因為呢幾個area funding size好大同對financial risk會有認識（你都唔想比銀行呃到你破產掛）。

Technical 唔知你咩renewable，幫你唔到。太陽能通街都係，好易請。
